org.lrdm.effectors.Action

Packages that use Action
Package
Description
org.lrdm.effectors
Package containing the Effector to add Adaptation Action to the simulation.
org.lrdm.topologies
Package containing topology strategies of the simulator.

    Class
    Description
    class 
    MirrorChange
    An adaptation action representing the change of the number of mirrors.
    class 
    TargetLinkChange
    An adaptation action representing the change of the number of links per mirror.
    class 
    TopologyChange
    An adaptation action representing the change of the topology.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Action
    Effector.setMirrors(int m, int t)
    Specify that at time step t the number of targeted mirrors is to be changed to m.
